description: Manage different versions of gremlin databases that are restorable in a Azure Cosmos DB account.

commands.name: az cosmosdb gremlin restorable-database list
commands.summary: List all the versions of all the gremlin databases that were created / modified / deleted in the given restorable account.

commands.name: az cosmosdb gremlin restorable-database list
commands.summary: List all the versions of all the gremlin databases that were created / modified / deleted in the given restorable account.
